title: Panic: could not process block from fork choice service: pre state of slot 35xxx does not exist
body:
On latest pull, as of 18:00 GMT 14/1/20.


```
[2020-01-15 10:20:18]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block 35374/39101 - estimated time remaining 1h28m44s blocksPerSecond=0.7 peers=4/5
[2020-01-15 10:20:21]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block 35374/39101 - estimated time remaining 1h22m49s blocksPerSecond=0.8 peers=4/5

[2020-01-15 10:20:23]  INFO forkchoice: Executing state transition on block root=0xb81eac08... slot=35380

[2020-01-15 10:20:24]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block 35380/39102 - estimated time remaining 31m48s blocksPerSecond=1.9 peers=1/5
**panic: could not process block from fork choice service: pre state of slot 35380 does not exist**
goroutine 221 [running]:
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/sync/initial-sync.(*Service).Start(0xc0003764e0)
	beacon-chain/sync/initial-sync/service.go:119 +0xd0d
created by github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/shared.(*ServiceRegistry).StartAll
	shared/service_registry.go:44 +0x23e
```

goroutine 210 [running]:
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/sync/initial-sync.(*Service).Start(0xc002b84c00)
	beacon-chain/sync/initial-sync/service.go:119 +0xd0d
created by github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/shared.(*ServiceRegistry).StartAll
	shared/service_registry.go:44 +0x23e
```

seeing it as well but at a different block
```
time="2020-01-15 12:23:27" level=info msg="Processing block 35561/39717 - estimated time remaining 53m16s" blocksPerSecond=1.3 peers="1/29" prefix=initial-sync
panic: could not process block from fork choice service: pre state of slot 35561 does not exist

goroutine 193 [running]:
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/sync/initial-sync.(*Service).Start(0xc0003eb680)
        beacon-chain/sync/initial-sync/service.go:119 +0xd0d
created by github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/shared.(*ServiceRegistry).StartAll
        shared/service_registry.go:44 +0x23e
```

and
```
time="2020-01-15 12:30:31" level=info msg="Processing block 35638/39752 - estimated time remaining 41m33s" blocksPerSecond=1.6 peers="1/30" prefix=initial-sync
panic: could not process block from fork choice service: pre state of slot 35638 does not exist

goroutine 192 [running]:
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/sync/initial-sync.(*Service).Start(0xc00289a000)
        beacon-chain/sync/initial-sync/service.go:119 +0xd0d
created by github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/shared.(*ServiceRegistry).StartAll
        shared/service_registry.go:44 +0x23e
```
after which it resets sync around block 35000

Yeah, on latest attempt i reset to 35138

```
...
[2020-01-15 12:38:50]  INFO initial-sync: Waiting for enough suitable peers before syncing required=3 suitable=2
[2020-01-15 12:38:51]  INFO p2p: Peer connected active=6 peer=16Uiu2HAmAsyW714qpiYz9dNEoDyLa29SuzXwU4sY3fQrRtUxN1bT

We haven't seen reports of this issue in a few days. Closing for now, but please reopen if you are experiencing continued issues.
